subject: WP Engine wins Gold Stevie Award for customer service excellence
body:
A gold standard in customer support 
WP Engine’s Customer Experience team earns top honors at this year’s Stevie Awards.
 
Find Out More Here 
 
A HISTORY OF EXCELLENCE IN SERVICE
Recognized leadership in customer support 
At WP Engine, customer satisfaction is more than a goal—it’s a driving force. That’s why we’re proud to announce that our Customer Experience (CX) team has earned the prestigious 
Gold Stevie Award
 for Customer Service Department of the Year in the Computer Services category! 
 
This incredible honor marks another major achievement in our long-standing history of excellence in customer service. Since 2015, WP Engine has won more than a dozen Stevie Awards, and our CX team is at the heart of this success. Continually setting the bar for exceptional support, their tireless dedication ensures that every customer experience is 
Customer-Inspired
. 
 
Here’s why this recognition is so special: 
Marks our 11th Stevie Award for customer support and our 15th Stevie Award overall
Highlights over a decade of consistent achievement at The Stevie Awards
Underscores the dedication and commitment of our incredible support agents  
Thank you to our amazing CX team and customers for making this possible. Let’s keep raising the bar together! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
WP Engine, 504 Lavaca St, #1000, Austin,TX 78701

subject: HubSpot Community: Weekly Digest
body:
Hello AVicente, 
You have 
1
 new subscriptions & activity updates in the HubSpot Community. 
Board: 
HubSpot Marketing
 (1 Update) 
katerdietz posted a new topic on Mar 26, 2025 12:56 PM
What is your email win back strategy for churned customers? (B2B)
 
Hey all! Would love to hear about what other B2B copanies are doing in terms of their email win back strategy. Specifically things like how long after customer churn do you reach out to them, what type of language do you use, outside of discounts and product improvments, do you include anything else in your communications to entice them to return?
Reply
 
HubSpot Community sent this message to 
a.vicente@lcwmail.com
.

manage your subscription & notification settings
 or 
unsubscribe

body:

Ashton, ever wonder if your company swag is actually worn and used, or collecting dust?
Branded merch isn’t just about slapping a logo on a pen. 
Done right
, swag builds brand identity, strengthens company culture, and keeps your business top of mind.
With 64% of Fortune 100 companies trusting Goody
 
for top-tier swag, we’ve got the insider tips that’ll transform your company merch from “meh” to 
✨memorable✨.
 Join us for our upcoming webinar on 
how to create swag that people 
actually
 want, use, and love.
🎮 Swag Reimagined: Level Up Your Company Merch Game
🗓️ April 22nd 2025
⏰ 11am PT / 2pm ET
Save my spot
​Whether you’re onboarding new hires, impressing clients, or boosting team morale, the right swag makes a lasting impact.
We’ll also be giving away some epic gifts
!
Past giveaways have been surprises from killer brands that 
everyone

subject: The secret to high-performing WordPress sites
body:
Optimize your website like a pro 
A performance blueprint for faster, more efficient WordPress
®
 sites.
 
SMARTER OPTIMIZATIONS FOR NEXT-LEVEL PERFORMANCE
Data-driven strategies to boost speed and efficiency. 
Your site’s speed impacts everything—from SEO to conversions. When every second counts, optimization isn’t optional. WP Engine’s new guide, Improve WordPress
 
Speed and Performance, provides expert-backed techniques for agencies and developers looking to enhance site performance.
 
Here’s what you’ll find inside: 
Essential insights into Core Web Vitals
: Learn how to optimize LCP, INP, and CLS for better search rankings and user experience. 
Advanced caching & CDN strategies
: Reduce latency and improve load times with smarter resource distribution.
Techniques for efficient asset management
: Optimize images, CSS, and JavaScript for peak performance. 
The managed hosting advantag
e: See how managed hosting can deliver up to 50% faster load times. 
Fine-tune your websites with data-driven performance enhancements. 
Download the Guide 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
WP Engine, 504 Lavaca St, #1000, Austin,TX 78701

body:

A Must-Attend Virtual Event for Everyone Who Builds on WordPress

Americas (CDT) | APAC (AEST) | EMEA (GMT) 
The web is changing fast—are you ready? Join thousands of WordPress
®
 professionals at DE{CODE} 2025, a half-day virtual conference designed to help you future-proof your skills, business, and strategies. 
Hear from 20+ industry experts, agencies, and WP Engine product leaders as they share clear, no-fluff insights on AI, performance, digital strategy, and more.
Secure Your Spot Today
Why attend DE{CODE} 2025? 
 
For Developers 
Exclusive insights on WordPress & AI from top industry leaders, breaking down how AI will reshape search and site development in the next 24 months.
 
For Agencies 
Strategies to win more business—how agencies are adapting to AI, shifting client needs, and emerging revenue models.
 
For Marketers & Brands 
Marketing and business strategy sessions covering AI-driven SEO, MarTech, and digital transformation.

Chief learning officers and corporate L&D leaders should strive to build an environment that supports a culture where continuous learning is the norm.

Eliminating L&D bottlenecks: How AI is fixing learning inefficiencies
TODAY, at 12:00 PM EST
: High-impact learning shouldn’t come with operational headaches. Join us to explore how AI-powered solutions can help L&D teams move faster, engage more learners, and focus on what truly matters.
Secure Your Seat
What It Really Takes to Get Long-Term Value from Microlearning
March 19, 2025, at 12:00 PM EST
: The idea of helping employees do their jobs better with the aid of bite-sized learning seems like a no-brainer. But do typical uses of microlearning really improve employees’ skills over time? Well, that depends on how it’s being used. If your goal as a learning and development professional is to help people learn new skills, then you’ll want to join this workshop to expand your view of what it takes to win with microlearning. It might surprise you. 
Secure Your Seat

subject: Your account is just over the storage limit.
body:
Review your options to ensure you are within plan storage limits.
 
Login  
 
 
 
Your account is 
approaching
 your plan overage limit 
Let's review your options!
Review Usage 
Here are some recommended options to rightsize your storage: 
 
Upgrade your hosting plan 
Upgrade your current plan to one of our larger self-serve options, tailored to support your growing business. You can easily modify your plan directly in the WP Engine User Portal.
 
Additionally, we offer custom solutions if the pre-set storage limits of these plans don’t suit your needs.
Review Usage
  
 
 
Reduce storage usage on your account 
Option 1: Deleting or optimizing files 
Unload storage space to keep your site running at its best by deleting unused files and images.
Option 2: Offloading media files 
If your site is utilizing large images and files, consider WP Offload Media or WP Engine’s LargeFS as an off-site storage solution.
Learn More
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
WP Engine, 504 Lavaca St, #1000, Austin,TX 78701

subject: Free Guide: Why Coaching Fails to Deliver Results
body:
How can you find a coaching provider capable of delivering results? 
 
Why Coaching Fails to Deliver Results
3 MIN READ
DOWNLOAD NOW
 
Free Guide!
 
Executive coaching can create incredible outcomes for leaders and their organizations. But, for every company in the coaching industry creating outstanding ROI for their clients, there are an equal number of companies doing the opposite. Maybe that is why only about 33% of business leaders in a Harvard Business Review survey said they were more effective after participating in a coaching or leadership development program.
 
 
How can you find a coaching provider capable of delivering results? Uncover the six reasons why most coaching providers fail to deliver the ROI they promise. And, we explain what HR and Talent Leaders can do about them.
DOWNLOAD NOW
BROUGHT TO YOU BY:
BetterWork Media Group | Chief Learning Officer | Chief Talent Officer
1 E Erie St., 525-2025, Chicago, Illinois, 60611, United States

 and 
Chief Talent Officer
 publications — trusted industry leaders for over 20 years. 
In today's digital transformation landscape, successful leaders need cutting-edge strategies and proven frameworks. CXO Academy combines the deep expertise of 
Chief Learning Officer
 and 
Chief Talent Officer
 with expert-led courses designed for leaders driving organizational innovation. 
CXO Academy is Exclusive to CXO+ Members. Join before March 31, 2025, to lock in our early adopter rate of $395 annually! Once the early adopter rate closes, pricing will jump to $595 annually. 
Learn More About CXO+ Membership
STRATEGY
Developing the Next Generation of Leaders at TTUS
A guiding compass drives the values and people strategy across the five universities that make up the Texas Tech University System.
Keep Reading
EVENTS
Eliminating L&D bottlenecks: How AI is fixing learning inefficiencies
March 12, 2025, at 12:00 PM EST
: High-impact learning shouldn’t come with operational headaches. Join us to explore how AI-powered solutions can help L&D teams move faster, engage more learners, and focus on what truly matters.
Secure Your Seat
What It Really Takes to Get Long-Term Value from Microlearning
March 19, 2025, at 12:00 PM EST
: The idea of helping employees do their jobs better with the aid of bite-sized learning seems like a no-brainer. But do typical uses of microlearning really improve employees’ skills over time? Well, that depends on how it’s being used. If your goal as a learning and development professional is to help people learn new skills, then you’ll want to join this workshop to expand your view of what it takes to win with microlearning. It might surprise you. 
Secure Your Seat
 
TRENDING
[WHAT'S TRENDING?]
 We’re curating top resources for learning leaders and would love your recommendations on books, podcasts, or apps. Share your favorites by the end of the month for a chance to be featured in Chief Learning Officer’s trending section! 
Contribute Today!
[
APPLY TO SPEAK] 
Interested in sharing your insights? Apply to speak at upcoming Chief Learning Officer events and inspire the next generation of leaders! 
Apply Today.
[RESOURCE]
 How can you find a coaching provider capable of delivering results? In this white paper, we uncover the six reasons why most coaching providers fail to deliver the ROI they promise. And, we explain what HR and Talent Leaders can do about them. 
Learn More
.
* 
[MEMBERSHIP] 
Join CXO+ for exclusive access to cutting-edge content, discounts and events! Connect with top professionals in corporate learning and talent management. Elevate your career today!  
Learn More
.

subject: 🌟 Save the Date: The #1 L&D Conference Returns This October
body:
Mark your calendar for the #1 conference in L&D and the most anticipated learning and development event of the year: The 21st annual Chief Learning Officer Symposium, taking place virtually October 22-24, 2025.
Dear Ashton,
Mark your calendar for the 
#1 conference in L&D
 and the most anticipated learning and development event of the year: The 
21st annual Chief Learning Officer Symposium
, virtually 
October 22-24, 2025
.
 
This year's theme, "
Building Resilient Learning Ecosystems: Foundations & Frameworks for a Sustainable Future
," couldn't be more timely. 
As L&D leaders, we're all asking ourselves: 
How do we build learning environments that don't just survive but thrive through change? 
 
Join fellow learning executives from across the globe to:
Exchange emerging best practices
Explore cutting-edge learning technologies
Develop frameworks for strategic skilling
Drive organizational transformation 
The best part? 
Registration is FREE this year
. 
 
Reserve your spot today
 and join the community that's shaping the future of corporate learning.
 
P.S. We're looking for speakers for this year's event. If you'd like to speak, please 
complete this form
. We're also looking for sponsors for this year's event. If you're interested in sponsoring, 
please complete this form
. 
 
Looking forward to seeing you there,
 
Ashley St. John
Editor in Chief, Chief Content Officer
Chief Learning Officer

female-founded brands
 and charities, bringing you the best gifts while supporting the businesses of numerous talented women. And of course, none of this would be possible without you. Thank you for being the heart of our community!

Gifts that make an impact

subject: Join Me Today: Transform Learning Operations from Cost Center to Competitive Advantage
body:
I'm personally inviting you to join me for what promises to be one of our most impactful webinars of the year: "Transforming Learning Operations: From Cost Containment to Competitive Advantage."
View in browser
Dear Ashton,
 
I'm personally inviting you to join me for what promises to be one of our most impactful webinars of the year: "
Transforming Learning Operations: From Cost Containment to Competitive Advantage
.
"
 
As 
Editor in Chief of Chief Learning Officer
, I've observed a critical shift among industry leaders. The organizations thriving today aren't merely containing learning costs – they strategically leverage learning operations as a competitive differentiator.
 
I'm thrilled to host 
Matt Donovan, Chief Learning and Innovation Officer at GP Strategies
, who will share insights on:
The 
evolution of learning organizations
 and operational maturity models
How to r
ewire your learning infrastructure
 for agility and innovation
Practical 
strategies to transform learning
 from a cost center to a strategic advantage
This session is specifically designed for 
forward-thinking executives like yourself
 who understand that learning operations can profoundly 
drive organizational performance
.
 
Event Details:
Date: 
Today, February 27, 2025  
Time:
 2:00 PM EST (1:00 PM CST)   
Register Now
I hope you'll 
join us
 for this valuable discussion that 
goes beyond theory
 to provide 
actionable insights you can implement
 immediately.
 
P.S.
 Feel free to 
extend this invitation
 to colleagues who would benefit from this conversation. 
This webinar is complimentary, 
but
 
r
egistration is required
.
 
Warm regards,
 
Ashley St. John
Editor in Chief
Chief Learning Officer & Chief Talent Officer

subject: DE{CODE} 2025 registration is now open! A more inclusive, innovative industry event.
body:
You are invited to join one of the biggest virtual conferences of the year for developers, agencies, and brands who build on WordPress.
 
 
The Premier Virtual Event for Innovators Who Build on WordPress 
Date & Time: Tuesday, April 15 at 10:00am
North America (CDT) | APAC (AEST) | EMEA (GMT) 
DE{CODE} is evolving! What started as a developer-focused event is now opening its doors wider—welcoming developers, agencies, and brands—to create a truly inclusive space for everyone building on WordPress
®
.
 
DE{CODE} 2025 brings expert-led insights from 20+ speakers, three dedicated content tracks for developers, agencies, and marketers, cutting-edge innovations in AI and web technology, and a global community of thousands—all designed for anyone building on WordPress to optimize performance, streamline workflows, and drive business results.
Save Your Spot Today 
Why attend DE{CODE} 2025? 
 
For Developers 
Master modern WordPress development with best practices in blocks, headless architectures, and AI-driven workflows.
 
For Agencies 
Discover agency growth trends, evolving client needs, and how to integrate modern frameworks and accessibility.
 
For Brands & Marketers 
Stay ahead in search, lead generation, and AI while optimizing your MarTech stack for real ROI.
Save Your Spot Today 
Join us for an event that is designed to inspire, educate, and empower everyone. Let’s build smarter, faster, and more powerful experiences on WordPress—together!
WP Engine is a proud member and supporter of the community of WordPress® users. The WordPress® trademark is the intellectual property of the WordPress Foundation. Uses of the WordPress® name in this message are for identification purposes only and do not imply an endorsement by WordPress Foundation.  WP Engine is not endorsed or owned by, or affiliated with, the WordPress Foundation.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
WP Engine, 504 Lavaca St, #1000, Austin,TX 78701
No longer want to receive these emails?
 
Unsubscribe
